Texts.Chs: 其内描写了制作一把威力残虐的法杖的一些事宜。
Texts.Eng: Instructions on constructing a fell staff

Texts.Chs: 年轻的学徒啊，永远不要离开你的武器。这根法杖是你最喜欢的物品，没有它，你只是旧日支配者们的食物。你必须用一本远古之书，两个沃尔坦核心和一个远古半身像来塑造它。
Texts.Eng: Never be without your implements, young apprentice. The staff is your most favored good, and without it you are but meat to the Elder ones. You must fashion it from an Elder Tome, 2 Valtan Casing and an Elder Bust...
